target: I have a few hotels that meet your needs. How about the Gonville Hotel? It is in the centre of town.
error_text: I didn't find any that matched that criteria.
context: <user>  I need a room in cambridge please <system>  Okay, do you have an area or price range you're looking for? <user>  expensive guesthouse. it should have free parking and wifi <system>  Unfortunately there are not guesthouses that meet your criteria. Would you like to look for something in the moderate price range or a hotel instead? <user>  How about any guesthouses available? <system>  I do not have any expensive guesthouses with wifi and parking. I do have some moderate or cheap ones.<user>  Hmm, well how about checking for a hotel instead that is expensive with free parking and wifi? <system>
